// å¤ç°çš„ demo
function App() {
  const [num, setNum] = useState(100)
  window.__setNum = setNum
  return <Comp num={num}></Comp>
}

function Comp(props) {
  debugger
  useEffect(() => {
    debugger
    props // {num:1000}
    return () => {
      debugger
      // ä¸ºä»€ä¹ˆè¿™é‡Œæ˜¯æ—§çš„ props? {num:100}
      props
    }
  }, [props.num])
  return (
    <p>
      <span>{props.num}</span>
    </p>
  )
}

setTimeout(() => {
  __setNum(1000)
}, 1000)
